alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Spokane Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 9:29AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHERN BONNER...NORTHWESTERN SHOSHONE...KOOTENAI...NORTHEASTERN SPOKANE AND SOUTHEASTERN PEND OREILLE COUNTIES... At 928 AM PST, an area of heavy snow was located near Athol, or 18 miles northeast of Hayden, moving east at 40 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. Locations impacted include... Spokane Valley, Coeur d`Alene, Post Falls, Hayden, Sandpoint, Rathdrum, Dalton Gardens, Priest River, Liberty Lake, Newport, Spirit Lake, Ponderay, Athol, Hauser, Kootenai, Hayden Lake, Dover, Clark Fork, East Hope, and Otis Orchards-East Farms. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 292 and 299. Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 0 and 31. U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 424 and 481. U.S. Highway 2 in Idaho between mile markers 0 and 28. U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 320 and 334. A winter weather advisory is in effect for the area. Please monitor local media outlets and the national weather service for further statements. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the snow passes your location. &&
